title: Titanic Survival with Machine Learning
description: In this article, I will take you through a very famous case study for machine learning practitioners which is to predict titanic survival with Machine Learning. I will first introduce you to this case study and then I will show you how we can build a predictive model to predict survival with Machine Learning.
